subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Cycling, Mountain Bike
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong, who has ended his fight against doping charges, told reporters after a race in Colorado, “Nobody needs to cry for me; I’m going to be great.”
snippet: Lance Armstrong, who has ended his fight against doping charges, told reporters after a race in Colorado, “Nobody needs to cry for me; I’m going to be great.”
